text: Goalball at the 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held in the Makuhari Messe in Tokyo. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the event to be held 26 August to 4 September 2020 was reassigned from 24 August to 5 September 2021. The impact of World Anti-Doping Agency on Russia's participation (first place in the women's category of the 2018 World Championships) has also to be determined. ==Medalists== {| |- |Men's team | | | |- |Women's team | | | |} ==Qualifying== Both men's and women's tournaments qualified 10 teams each for the Games. ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
